text.more:
Graph showing all county and what Duchy, Kingdom or Empire they belong to. And what Cultue and Religion they have at the start of the game.
As Duchy, Kingdom and Empire are legal titles rather then geographical descriptors they are not linked together in this graph.

The layout is from the "Force Atlas 2", available by default in Gephi.

On this graph, nodes are sized according to betweenness centrality, but with all the top Cultures, Religions, Empires and Kingdoms having their Centrality reduced to 0.

as the network is based on a connection of counties via shared culture and religion and Law (historical titles). these points of connections will obioulsly have a higher centrality mesure.
By reducing their centrality mesure and leaving that of the county, we see the counties that connect the most counties, Cultures and Titiles show up.

This gives us a map of the counties where conflict ought to be more likely to occur if warfare and conflict is indeed caused by differing cultures, religions and affiliations.
text.intro:
Graph showing all Countys and to what they are linked.
The node placed via the Force Atlas 2 algorithme
text.title: CK3-County-Network-Force Atlas- betweenness centrality
